title: Russian Shelling Kills at Least 10 in Christmas Eve Attack on Kherson, Ukraine Says
description: Scores more are injured in the assault on the southern city’s center, Ukraine’s president says, denouncing the strike as terror.

title: The Ukraine War Is Pushing Turkey Closer to Russia
description: Turkey is deepening economic ties with Russia in a high-risk bid to support its economy, defying Western sanctions on Moscow amid contentious relations with its NATO partners.

title: Fire at Russian Private Shelter Kills 22
description: Six other people were injured in the blaze at the shelter, which Russian officials said was operating illegally.

title: Egypt Is Spending Billions on a New Capital That Egyptians May Not Visit
description: The new city, estimated to cost tens of billions of U.S. dollars, is a centerpiece of President Abdel Fattah Al Sisi’s plan for modernizing the country.
